title: composer update fails w/ phpunit/php-text-template
body:
Since yesterday, I'm getting errors on master when running composer update after removing the vendor dir.

```
Loading composer repositories with package information
Updating dependencies (including require-dev)
Your requirements could not be resolved to an installable set of packages.

  Problem 1
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.0 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.1 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.2 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.3 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.4 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.5 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.6 requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.1.x-dev requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - phpunit/php-code-coverage 2.2.x-dev requires phpunit/php-text-template ~1.2 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-text-template[1.2.1].
    - Conclusion: don't install phpunit/php-text-template 1.2.1
    - Installation request for phpunit/php-code-coverage ~2.1 -> satisfiable by phpunit/php-code-coverage[2.1.0, 2.1.1, 2.1.2, 2.1.3, 2.1.4, 2.1.5, 2.1.6, 2.1.x-dev, 2.2.x-dev].
```

For reference: https://revive.beccati.com/bamboo/browse/PHP-PHPUN-399/log
